titles.title: To establish a commission to study how Federal laws and policies affect United States citizens living in foreign countries.
Commission on Americans Living Abroad Act of 2019
Commission on Americans Living Abroad Act of 2019
Commission on Americans Living Abroad Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Ways and Means, the Judiciary, House Administration, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
